summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Executive Department, Office of Management and Budget; repealing Ordinance 104367 establishing a Project Team for Research, investigation and development of a City Resource Recovery Project for extraction of Methanol, Ammonia, Urea and/or other related products from solid wastes; abolishing certain positions and creating one additional position of Financial Economist and decreasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1977 Budget of the Executive Department, Office of Management and Budget.
